input_brief: Plan and generate 5-10 short-form content ideas and scripts for cross-promotion; prepare hooks, on-screen text, and CTAs.

outputs.title: POV: You found this in the recycling bin at the Pentagon
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Close-up of hands pulling a 'classified document' out of a paper shredder

script.visual: Hands unfolding a crumpled 'classified document' (the design), camera slowly reveals the redacted text. Cut to the t-shirt with the design. Model reads the visible words between bars. Final shot: model wearing the shirt walking away.
on_screen_text: POV: you found this in the recycling bin at the Pentagon
script.audio: Trending suspenseful sound or 'X-Files theme' remix

outputs.cta: Link in bio ‚Äî before it gets redacted too
outputs.estimated_reach: High ‚Äî conspiracy content performs well, POV format is trending

outputs.title: This design has layers... literally
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Black screen, single golden eye opens slowly

script.visual: Animation/transition showing design layers building: first the dark background, then the capitol silhouette rises, then geometric rays appear, then the golden eye fades in on top. Final frame: the complete design on a black hoodie. End card with shop link.
script.audio: Deep bass buildup sound, dramatic reveal

outputs.cta: The eye is watching. Are you? Link in bio.
outputs.estimated_reach: Medium-High ‚Äî design process reveals get good engagement

outputs.title: Sacred geometry but make it tech
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Spinning sacred geometry animation with glitch effects

script.visual: Start with traditional sacred geometry (Flower of Life) spinning slowly. Glitch transition ‚Äî it transforms into the tech-fused version with WiFi symbols, data nodes, circuit traces. Pull back to reveal it's on a black t-shirt. Model turns to show the design. Cut to holographic sticker catching light.
script.audio: Chill electronic/lo-fi beat with glitch sound effects on transition

outputs.cta: Holographic sticker drops with every tee order this week
outputs.estimated_reach: Medium ‚Äî sacred geometry niche is dedicated, cross-appeal with tech audience

outputs.title: Your desk setup is missing something
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Overhead shot of clean desk setup, something slides into frame

script.visual: Clean desk setup top-down view. Hands slide the cyberpunk desk mat into position. Keyboard and mouse placed on top. RGB lights sync to the neon green of the mat. Final shot: full setup with monitor showing matching wallpaper.

outputs.cta: Upgrade your desk. Link in bio.
outputs.estimated_reach: High ‚Äî desk setup content is consistently popular, crossover gaming audience

outputs.title: Would you hang this on your wall?
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Blurred close-up of the cosmic eye, slowly pulling focus

script.visual: Slow cinematic pull-back from extreme close-up of the cosmic eye, revealing the full poster with Earth below. Cut to someone hanging the framed poster on a wall. Step back ‚Äî wide shot of the room with the poster as centerpiece. Engagement prompt on screen.
on_screen_text: Would you hang this on your wall? üëÅÔ∏èüåç
script.audio: Epic orchestral ambient, Hans Zimmer vibes

outputs.cta: Comment YES if you'd hang this. Link in bio for the brave.
outputs.estimated_reach: High ‚Äî engagement bait (yes/no) + art reveals perform well

outputs.title: I designed 6 conspiracy-themed products. Here's the full drop.
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: 'I spent [X] hours designing a conspiracy collection' text on black

script.visual: Fast montage of all 6 themes ‚Äî 4 seconds each. Show the design, then the product mockup. Build energy with each theme. End with full collection grid shot. Drop link.
on_screen_text: Which one's your favorite? Comment the number üëá
script.audio: Building electronic beat, drops on each design reveal

outputs.cta: Comment your favorite number. Link in bio for the full collection.
outputs.estimated_reach: High ‚Äî collection reveals and 'pick your favorite' formats drive comments

outputs.title: Can you spot all the eyes? üëÅÔ∏è
outputs.hook: Slide 1: Beautiful cloud photo (or the design zoomed out). Caption: 'Swipe to look closer...'

script.visual: Slide 1: Full design zoomed out, looks like pretty clouds. Slides 2-4: Progressive zoom-ins revealing hidden eyes in the clouds. Slide 5: The canvas print in a room setting. Slide 6: Product link + 'how many did you find?'
on_screen_text: Can you spot all the eyes?
Now imagine this on your wall

outputs.cta: How many eyes did you find? Comment your count. Canvas prints shipping now.
outputs.estimated_reach: Medium-High ‚Äî interactive carousels get saved and shared

outputs.title: I built a 6-design conspiracy art collection. Here's the creative process üßµ
outputs.hook: Tweet 1: 'I designed 6 conspiracy-themed products from concept to listing. Here's every step, every decision, and what I'd do differently üßµüëá'

script.visual: Thread with images: concept sketch ‚Üí color palette ‚Üí final design ‚Üí product mockup for each theme. 10-12 tweets total.
on_screen_text: Tweets 2-7: One design per tweet with before/after

outputs.cta: Full collection live now. RT if you'd buy one, quote tweet with your favorite.
outputs.estimated_reach: Medium ‚Äî threads get bookmarked, good for building authority in POD niche

outputs.title: The $4 sticker that's outselling my shirts
outputs.hook: First 2 seconds: Hand slapping CLASSIFIED sticker on a laptop

script.visual: Quick montage: sticker being applied to laptop, water bottle, notebook, phone case. Each application is a fast cut with satisfying 'slap' sound. Final shot: all items together.
script.audio: Satisfying slap/click sounds, upbeat short clip

outputs.cta: Classify your stuff. Link in bio.
outputs.estimated_reach: High ‚Äî sticker content is short, satisfying, and shareable

outputs.title: Conspiracy Art Collection ‚Äî Dark Aesthetic Home Decor & Streetwear
outputs.hook: Vertical pin image: grid of all 6 designs with 'CONSPIRACY ART COLLECTION' text overlay

script.visual: 2:3 vertical pin. Top: collection title in bold typography. Middle: 2x3 grid of all 6 designs. Bottom: 'Shop the full collection' CTA. Clean, pinnable aesthetic.

outputs.cta: Pin links to collection page or Etsy shop
hashtags: N/A ‚Äî use Pinterest keywords in description: conspiracy art, dark aesthetic, all seeing eye, occult home decor, truth seeker gifts, graphic tee designs
outputs.estimated_reach: Long-tail ‚Äî Pinterest drives passive traffic for months. Key platform for POD.

launch_sequence: Day 1: SC-006 (full collection reveal) ‚Äî build hype
Day 2: SC-001 (Redacted Truth POV) ‚Äî highest virality potential
Day 3: SC-004 (desk setup) ‚Äî different audience crossover
Day 4: SC-007 (Eyes carousel on IG) ‚Äî engagement play
Day 5: SC-002 (design process) ‚Äî behind-the-scenes builds trust
Day 7: SC-005 (Gaze of Atlas) ‚Äî premium product push
Day 8: SC-009 (sticker) ‚Äî low-barrier impulse buy content
Day 10: SC-003 (sacred geometry) ‚Äî niche audience deep cut
Ongoing: SC-010 (Pinterest) ‚Äî set and forget, update quarterly
content_calendar_notes.posting_times: 10-11 AM CST and 7-9 PM CST for TikTok/Reels. Pinterest: anytime. Twitter threads: Tuesday-Thursday mornings.
content_calendar_notes.repurposing: Every TikTok ‚Üí Reels + YouTube Shorts. Carousels ‚Üí Pinterest. Thread ‚Üí blog post for SEO.
